name: Multi Platform Content Generator from YouTube using AI & RSS

user.name: Budi SJ
user.bio: I‚Äôm a Product Designer who also works as an Automation Developer. With a background in product design and systems thinking, I build user-centered workflows. My focus is on helping teams and businesses work more productively through impactful automation systems.

description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

# Multi Platform Content Generator from YouTube using AI & RSS

This workflow automates content generation by monitoring YouTube channels, extracting transcripts via AI, and creating platform-optimized content for LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Threads, and Instagram. Ideal for creators, marketers, and social media managers aiming to scale content production with minimal effort.


## ‚ú® Key Features
- **üîî Automated YouTube Monitoring** via RSS feed
- **üß† AI-Powered Transcript Extraction** using Supadata API
- **‚úçÔ∏è Multi-Platform Content Generation** with OpenRouter AI
- **üéØ Platform Optimization** based on tone and character limits
- **üì¨ Telegram Notification** for easy preview
- **üìä Centralized Data Management via Google Sheets**

> üóÇÔ∏è All video data, summaries, and generated content are tracked and stored in a single, centralized [Google Sheets template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17OjwIwx7eAwbkT5wtwvpCQU4rjrLH0v7j3fmC2Sc1CY/edit?usp=sharing)  
> This ensures full visibility, easy access, and smooth collaboration across your team.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Components

### 1. üß≠ Channel Monitoring
- **Schedule Trigger**: Initiates workflow periodically
- **Google Sheets (Read)**: Pulls YouTube channel URLs
- **HTTP Request + HTML Parser**: Extracts channel IDs from URLs
- **RSS Reader**: Fetches latest video metadata

### 2. üßæ Content Processing
- **Supadata API**: Extracts transcript from YouTube video
- **OpenRouter AI**: Summarizes transcript + generates content per platform
- **Conditional Check**: Prevents duplicate content by checking existing records

### 3. üì§ Multi-Platform Output
- **LinkedIn**: Story-driven format (‚â§ 1300 characters)
- **X/Twitter**: Short, punchy copy (‚â§ 280 characters)
- **Threads**: Friendly, conversational
- **Instagram**: Short captions for visual posts

### 4. üóÉÔ∏è Data Management
- **Google Sheets (Write)**: Stores video metadata + generated posts
- **Telegram Bot**: Sends content preview
- **ID Tracking**: Avoids reprocessing using video ID

---

## üîê Required Credentials
- **Google Sheets OAuth2**
- **Supadata API**
- **OpenRouter API**
- **Telegram Bot Token & Chat ID**

---

## üéÅ Benefits
- **‚åõ Save Time**: Automates transcript + content generation
- **üîä Consistent Tone**: Adjust AI prompts for brand voice
- **üì° Multi-Platform Ready**: One video ‚Üí multiple formats
- **üìÇ Centralized Logs via Google Sheets**: Easily track, audit, and collaborate
- **üöÄ Scalable**: Handle many channels with ease

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

workflow.name: Multi Platform Content Generator from YouTube using AI & RSS

parameters.content:
# Multi Platform Content Generator from YouTube using AI & RSS

This workflow automates content generation by monitoring YouTube channels, extracting transcripts via AI, and creating platform-optimized content for LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Threads, and Instagram. Ideal for creators, marketers, and social media managers aiming to scale content production with minimal effort.


## ‚ú® Key Features
- **üîî Automated YouTube Monitoring** via RSS feed
- **üß† AI-Powered Transcript Extraction** using Supadata API
- **‚úçÔ∏è Multi-Platform Content Generation** with OpenRouter AI
- **üéØ Platform Optimization** based on tone and character limits
- **üì¨ Telegram Notification** for easy preview
- **üìä Centralized Data Management via Google Sheets**

> üóÇÔ∏è All video data, summaries, and generated content are tracked and stored in a single, centralized [Google Sheets template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17OjwIwx7eAwbkT5wtwvpCQU4rjrLH0v7j3fmC2Sc1CY/edit?usp=sharing)  
> This ensures full visibility, easy access, and smooth collaboration across your team.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Components

### 1. üß≠ Channel Monitoring
- **Schedule Trigger**: Initiates workflow periodically
- **Google Sheets (Read)**: Pulls YouTube channel URLs
- **HTTP Request + HTML Parser**: Extracts channel IDs from URLs
- **RSS Reader**: Fetches latest video metadata

### 2. üßæ Content Processing
- **Supadata API**: Extracts transcript from YouTube video
- **OpenRouter AI**: Summarizes transcript + generates content per platform
- **Conditional Check**: Prevents duplicate content by checking existing records

### 3. üì§ Multi-Platform Output
- **LinkedIn**: Story-driven format (‚â§ 1300 characters)
- **X/Twitter**: Short, punchy copy (‚â§ 280 characters)
- **Threads**: Friendly, conversational
- **Instagram**: Short captions for visual posts

### 4. üóÉÔ∏è Data Management
- **Google Sheets (Write)**: Stores video metadata + generated posts
- **Telegram Bot**: Sends content preview
- **ID Tracking**: Avoids reprocessing using video ID

---

## üîê Required Credentials
- **Google Sheets OAuth2**
- **Supadata API**
- **OpenRouter API**
- **Telegram Bot Token & Chat ID**

---

## üéÅ Benefits
- **‚åõ Save Time**: Automates transcript + content generation
- **üîä Consistent Tone**: Adjust AI prompts for brand voice
- **üì° Multi-Platform Ready**: One video ‚Üí multiple formats
- **üìÇ Centralized Logs via Google Sheets**: Easily track, audit, and collaborate
- **üöÄ Scalable**: Handle many channels with ease

- Triggers the automation at regular intervals.
- Reads YouTube channel URLs from a Google Sheets document
- Sends an HTTP GET request to the YouTube channel URL pulled from Google Sheets.

- Extracts channel links from YouTube pages, specifically to obtain the channel id.
- Extracts the channel ID from the full URL and constructs an RSS feed link that conforms to YouTube format.
- Reads the RSS feed from a YouTube channel based on the previously created RSS URL.

- Save video metadata to Google Sheet
- Read back video data from the updated sheet, especially to check whether the summary column is populated.

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet

parameters.content:
- Automatically retrieve transcripts from YouTube videos using the API
- Combine transcript sections into a single, complete text
- Set the output language that will be used by LLM

- Prompt the AI model to generate a summary from the transcript.
- Save the summary to a Google Sheet.
- The summary will be used as input for subsequent AI models, allowing for more efficient token usage.

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet1

parameters.content:
- Provide prompts to the AI model to generate content based on the summary.
- Created content is personalized according to platform type.
- Currently available platforms are:
  - LinkedIn
  - X
  - Threads
  - Instagram
- Save generated content to Google Sheets

messageValues.message:
=You are an AI assistant that helps you create summaries of YouTube videos based on the complete transcript.

Create a summary using informative, neutral, and easy to understand language.

Focus on the main points of the conversation, who the speaker is, the main topic, and the insights discussed. Do not add information that is not included in the transcript.

Write in {{ $json.language }} language.

=Create a LinkedIn post based on the transcript.

Use a storytelling style that highlights the key lesson, insight, or takeaway from the video. Write as if you‚Äôre sharing a personal experience or a meaningful conversation that adds value to professionals, entrepreneurs, or creators.

Structure the post with a strong hook, a few short and easy-to-read paragraphs, and a closing sentence that invites reflection or discussion.

Write in Write in {{ $('Set Language').item.json.language }} language.

Write in a natural, professional tone. Do not exceed 1,300 characters.

=Create a post for X (formerly Twitter) based on the video transcript.

The post should be punchy, bold, or thought-provoking ‚Äî something that stops scrolling. Focus on delivering one key insight, surprising fact, or controversial idea from the video.

Limit to 280 characters. Write with energy and make it feel like the start of a conversation. Write in Write in {{ $('Set Language').item.json.language }} language.

=Create a post for Threads based on the video transcript.

Use a casual, friendly tone ‚Äî as if you‚Äôre talking to your audience directly. Present the insight or story from the video in a relatable, open way.

Break into 1‚Äì3 short paragraphs. Avoid being overly formal or promotional. Write in Write in {{ $('Set Language').item.json.language }} language.

=Create an Instagram caption based on the video transcript.

Focus on short, emotionally resonant phrases that capture the core message or feeling of the video. Each sentence should be no longer than 150 characters and stand alone visually.

Write as if these lines will be used in a carousel post or overlaid on a reel. Write in Write in {{ $('Set Language').item.json.language }} language.
